#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define maxn 100005
using namespace std;
ll inp[maxn], n ,t;
map<ll, ll> mp;
int main()
{
	scanf("%lld", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld", &n);
		for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
		   scanf("%lld", &inp[i]);
	  
		sort(inp, inp+n);
		
		ll cnt = 1;
		mp[cnt] = inp[0];
		for(ll i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(inp[i-1]<inp[i])
			   mp[cnt] = inp[i]; 
			else 
			{
			   bool flag = false;
			   for(ll j=1;j<=cnt;j++)
			   {
			   	  if(mp[j] < inp[i])
			   	  {
			   	  	 flag = true;
			   	  	 mp[j] = inp[i];
			   	  	 break;
			   	  }
			   }	
			   if(!flag)
			   {
			   	   cnt++;
			   	   mp[cnt] = inp[i];
			   }
			}
		}
		mp.clear();
		printf("%lld\n", cnt);
	}
}
